definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
to make a speech/to make some remarks
dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]

sentences.english: It's the plural for heaven, so the heavens or the heavenly places is this Greek word.
sentences.chinese: 这里用的是复数，天国和神圣之地是同一个希腊词。

sentences.english: We have several word letters that uses a series of forms to input into the doc.
sentences.chinese: 我们有几个字母词使用到文档形式输入一个系列。

sentences.english: Never waste too much time on some new words and single sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要在单个词或单句上浪费太多时间。

sentences.english: Or maybe curiosity is a better word.
sentences.chinese: 或者，好奇才是更确切的词。

sentences.english: If I were to add the word pigmy, ring a bell?
sentences.chinese: 如果我加上词，矮人，听起来熟悉吗？

sentences.english: One woman said she had scribbled "California" on her paper.
sentences.chinese: 一个女人说她在纸上草草写了“加州”这个词。

sentences.english: The first chapter mainly analyzes the modal words' position in the word class.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要分析了方式词的词类地位。

sentences.english: He is perfect as the sensitive but strong reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他把一个敏感而言词犀利的记者演得完美无缺。

sentences.english: In this movie we often pay attention to a vocabulary of "institutionalized".
sentences.chinese: 在这个影片里我经常注意的一个词“体制化”。

sentences.english: Quite a number of imprecise words are used in our everyday speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们的日常用语中有相当一部分是不确定词。

sentences.english: I refuse to even use the hyphenated term Chinese-American.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至拒绝使用“美籍华裔”这个组合词。

sentences.english: You have spelt this word wrong.
He repeated the word several times.
sentences.chinese: 他把那个词重复了几遍。

sentences.english: Granny grudged to part with anything, including the disused.
sentences.chinese: 也许这个词已经废弃不用了吧。

sentences.english: Please think of five words about the color.
sentences.chinese: 请说出五个有关颜色的词。

sentences.english: By the end of the chapter, you'll have guessed the meaning of this word.
sentences.chinese: 等您读完这一章时，您就会猜出这个词的意思了。

definition: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
